titleStmt.title: A preface to the Kynges hyghnes
Exhortation to the people, instructynge theym to unitie and obedience
titleStmt.author: Starkey, Thomas, d. 1538.

publicationStmt.publisher: In aedibus Thomae Bertheleti Regii impressoris excusa. Cum privilegio,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title, leaf a2r.
Uniform title from caption title, leaf c4v: An exhortation to the people, instructynge theym to vnitie and obedience.
Imprint from colophon; H. Dyson had a copy dated 1536 on the title page according to his MS. catalogue at All Soul's College (University of Oxford) Library--STC.
Numerous misfoliations; foliation deduced from signature collation.
Imperfect; lacks all before leaf a2.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
